titleStmt.title: The great evil of health-drinking, or, A discourse wherein the original evil, and mischief of drinking of healths are discovered and detected, and the practice opposed with several remedies and antidotes against it, in order to prevent the sad consequences thereof.
titleStmt.author: Morton, Charles, 1627-1698.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to C. Morton. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
